description: A humorous nod to French winter customs and the iconic Eiffel Tower.
title: Winter in Paris
n_1: Marie and Luc bundle up against the Paris chill.
n_2: They stroll towards the Eiffel Tower, cups in hand.
n_3: Under the tower, they toast to the winter.
n_4: They enjoy the view, savoring their drinks.
c1_4: Winter's not so bad with this.
